COMPANY

건축물과 문화적 수준, 그리고 삶의 행복을 높이기 위한 무형의 가치를 창조합니다.
  • OVERVIEW
  • VISION
Company Profile

Agonizing to get the solution
for sound
with you

ARCHISOUND Corp. is a company which creates the intangible value to raise the standard of culture and structure.
We combine the talented people, long experience with technological prowess regarding special field, sound acoustics. We have provided customized services which are focused on the best result of sound work optimized customers’ needs. In addition, we operate our own architectural and electro acoustic VE(Value consulting system to make reasonable solution for needs of customers Engineering). ARCHISOUND Corp. on the basis of the experience and technological prowess it had accumulated over the years, provides not only architectural and interior design but also solutions for related services such as screen equipment, stage equipment, special lighting, and ventilation system. in particular, we have positioned ourselves as a companion to realize our customers’ dream by enhancing the efficiency and value of projects with ration process, providing creative sound design optimized functionality and economics in tandem with deference to intention of design.

CEO MESSAGE

We will do our best to earn
our customers’ infinite trust

Thank you for visiting ARCHISOUND Corp. Founded in 2010, ARCHISOUND Corp. set a goal for human happiness based on the principle of creativity, harmony, and co-prosperity. We have improved customers satisfaction by providing construction service allowing for aesthetic side of the interior and exterior of the building and its sensitivity as well and have worked hard to do our best with responsibility for customers. Also, we have made great efforts to grow into the top company in the special field of architectural sound, mostly barren area and have led to success of many projects including ‘2012 Nuclear Security Summit’. We think these results was able to be achieved due to the effort of many members of our staff and the unbounded confidence from our customers. Now ARCHISOUND Corp. will keep doing our best to reward for customers confidence based on ‘people-centered emotional management’ and our own principles. Again, we would like to thank you all for visiting our company and hope we could make it with you where your satisfaction and happiness about sounds needed.
CEO WooSeung Lim

As of 2024

Through customized services
We provide solutions optimized
for customer needs

Archisound provides solutions optimized for customer needs through customized services. To this end, we have a systematic expert organization and process that can optimize the scope, method, and goal level of work by analyzing the customer's conditions and environment in the entire process or specific stages from planning to post-completion follow-up management.

  • 페이스북으로 이동
  • 인스타그램으로 이동
  • 유튜브로 이동
INDUSTRY FIRST
  • Selected as a ‘high-growth company in the Asia-Pacific region’ for the first time in Korea in the audio industry three times in a row from 2021 to 2023
  • For the first time in Korea, we performed architectural acoustic consulting services for the summit hall of the largest ‘2012 International Summit on Nuclear Security’ in Korea.
  • Architectural sound construction for the Mariinsky Theater, the first large-scale opera and ballet performance hall in Russia's Primorsky Krai in 2013.
  • The 76th floor Grand Ballroom of Signiel Seoul, a 6-star hotel, is the world's tallest hotel banquet hall located at 324m. We provide architectural acoustics, noise and vibration consulting, and electroacoustic measurement services for the world's tallest hotel banquet hall.
  • The HYBE Yongsan 1.0 project was recognized as the best architectural sound company with the largest audio and video content production facility in Korea and the world at the time, and was also appointed as a designer and construction company for the 2.0 project.
  • Design and construction of the architectural acoustic section of the audio video content production facility for the first time in Korea worth more than 15 billion won (Hive Yongsan 1.0+2.0 Project, 2019-2023)
  • Design and construction of 168 sound video content production facilities in a single building for the first time in Korea (Hive Yongsan office building, 2019~2023)
  • Construction sound design consulting service of the hologram concert hall ("K-Pop Hologram: YG at Everland"), which is operated at all times for the first time in Korea as a theme park.
  • Architectural Sound Design of Korea's First Animal-Related Breeding Plant and Exhibition Center in 2016 Performing the stage, construction stage consulting, and completion stage service (Everland Panda World)
  • In 2011, the architectural sound design consulting service of Cheongsim Peace World Center, the largest indoor arena-type complex culture and art space in Korea (25,000 people) was conducted (Opened in March 2012)
